downloadTitle: Understanding the Host Integration Server Client
downloadDescription: This white paper discusses the HIS Client, including installation, configuration, architecture, and best practices.
detailsSection: This white paper discusses the Microsoft® Host Integration Server (HIS) Client. Topics include the installation and configuration of the HIS Client as well as details around some of the underlying HIS client/server architecture and how HIS resources are located by the HIS Client. In addition, some guidance is given around best practices for the HIS Client.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
